{
    "number": 135510,
    "data": "2,3,4,6,6,14,20,28,38,54,90,150,216,350,506,876,1230,2034,3160,4470,7764,12190,18816,29952,43800,73968,112602,182210,285780,474558,729432,1194078,1843110,2990880,4662450,7608720,11801580,18489120,29790300",
    "name": "Least positive number missing from row n of Stern's diatomic array (see A049456 or A002487).",
    "comment": [
        "The old definition was \"Least numbers not generated by Eisenstein's algorithm: m=1 n=1, then insert between them m+n, at stage p=1. (E.g. next stage (p=2) of Eisenstein's algorithm would be m, m+m+n, m+n, m+n+n, n). The maximum of these symmetric row elements at stage p is fibonacci(p+2); but how to determine the first number not generated at stage p?\""
    ],
    "reference": [
        "G. Eisenstein, 1850, '\u00dcber ein einfaches Mittel zur Auffindung der hoeheren Reciprocitaetsgesetze und der mit ihnen zu verbindenden Ergaenzungssaetze', Journal fuer die reine und angewandte Mathematik, Volume 39, page 351ff."
    ],
    "link": [
        "_Don Reble_, <a href=\"/A293160/a293160.txt\">C++ program for A135510 and A293160</a>",
        "M. A. Stern, <a href=\"http://dx.doi.org/10.1515/crll.1858.55.193\">\u00dcber eine zahlentheoretische Funktion</a>, J. Reine Angew. Math., 55 (1858), 193-220."
    ],
    "maple": [
        "A049456 := proc(n, k)",
        "    option remember;",
        "    if n =1 then",
        "        if k >= 0 and k <=1 then",
        "            1;",
        "        else",
        "            0 ;",
        "        end if;",
        "    elif type(k, 'even') then",
        "        procname(n-1, k/2) ;",
        "    else",
        "        procname(n-1, (k+1)/2)+procname(n-1, (k-1)/2) ;",
        "    end if;",
        "end proc: # R. J. Mathar, Dec 12 2014",
        "mex := proc(L)",
        "        local k;",
        "        for k from 1 do",
        "                if not k in L then",
        "                        return k;",
        "                end if;",
        "        end do:",
        "end proc:",
        "rho:=n->[seq(A049456(n,k),k=0..2^(n-1))];",
        "[seq(mex(rho(n)),n=1..16)]; # _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 14 2017"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A049456, A002487, A293160."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,more",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "mc (da-da(AT)lycos.de), Feb 09 2008",
    "ext": [
        "Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 14 2017",
        "a(29)-a(39) from _Don Reble_, Oct 16 2016"
    ],
    "references": 3,
    "revision": 24,
    "time": "2017-10-19T10:46:17-04:00",

}
